title: Losing connection with no ping spikes
body:
Hey 
About a month ago or so I have been experiencing a lot of random D/Cs while my internet connection is still fine. I have discord running and talking to people the whole time while my champ freezes up and I see everyone else running around on my screen. It only lasts about 20 or so seconds but happens multiple times through out the game. 
I have run the hextech repair tool and it says my connection is fine. Is this a packet loss deal? 

Any advice or help is appreciated! 

Side note my friend is also having the same issue, hopefully the advice here can help him too!

Thanks in advance {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
This might very well be a case of packet loss if you already know your connection is running pretty solid. Luckily we do have a pretty easy way to test for it by letting our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan some network logs from a game that had that weird lag. 

Let that tool scan your logs and grab a screenshot to post here. That way I can see what's up and go over it with you.
